Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_DIRECTORY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">C:\WORKFLOW_AUTO</INP_DIRECTORY><INP_FILE class="workflow.types.File" _list_="false" /><INP_PB_DELAY class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">0</INP_PB_DELAY><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_PAUSE_WF class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF><INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR><X class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></X></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_CREATE_DIR_MOVE_FILE
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><var_user_input_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_FILE_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DIR_JOBID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></variables>

children.documentation: Input File will be copied/moved/renamed in this directory
children.name: INP_DIRECTORY

children.displayName: Number of seconds to delay process blocks:
children.name: INP_PB_DELAY

children.displayName: Provide email address to send the report
children.name: INP_EMAIL_ID

children.displayName: Pause workflow in file operations proces block?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="/* Set uploaded File path */
File fileObject = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_FILE};
workflow.setVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH",fileObject.getAbsolutePath());
logger.info("INFO: File uploaded on server ["+ xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName} +"] at the location:-> ["+ workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH") +"]");

logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH") + "]");
/* Set uploaded File name */
workflow.setVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME",fileObject.getName());
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_FILE_NAME = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME") + "]");
/* Set Destination directory */
String tmp = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DIRECTORY} + "\\" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId};
workflow.setVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_DIR_JOBID = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "]");
/* Set new file name */
String tmp = "moved_" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME") + "]");
/* Set Destination path for new file */
String tmp = workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "\\" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH") + "]");
/* Set destination path for current file */
String tmp = workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "\\" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH") + "]");" /></inputs>

<inputs><inputs><pb1_client class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><pb1_directory class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><pb1_delay class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><pb1_source_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><pb1_destination_directory class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><pb1_destination_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><pb1_moved_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></inputs></inputs>

Activity.description: Execute a script on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteScript

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_client}</client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" /><scriptType class="commvault.msgs.App.ScriptType">WindowsBatch</scriptType><script class="java.lang.String">if not exist "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_directory}" ( mkdir "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_directory}" exit 0 ) else ( exit 0 )</script><arguments class="java.lang.String" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: Execute a command on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteCommand

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_client}</client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><command class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">powershell "copy 'xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_source_file_path}' 'xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_destination_directory}'"</command><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: Execute a command on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteCommand

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_client}</client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><command class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">move "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_destination_file_path}" "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_moved_file_path}"</command><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

inputs.val: <inputs><inputs><pb1_client class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName}</pb1_client><pb1_directory class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DIR_JOBID}</pb1_directory><pb1_delay class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_PB_DELAY}</pb1_delay><pb1_source_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH}</pb1_source_file_path><pb1_destination_directory class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DIR_JOBID}</pb1_destination_directory><pb1_destination_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH}</pb1_destination_file_path><pb1_moved_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH}</pb1_moved_file_path></inputs><processBlock>ProcessBlock_1</processBlock><outputs /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a set of activities when the workflow completes
Activity.name: OnWorkflowComplete

Activity.description: Sends an email to a list of users
Activity.name: Email

inputs.val:
<inputs><email><from /><to>xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</to><cc /><bcc /><subject>COMPLETED : xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} : xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} : xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</subject><attachments /><repeatInterval /><body><p>
      <b>Executed on Commserve: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/commCellName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Workflow Engine: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Workflow Name:</b> xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Workflow version:</b> xpath:{/workflow/system/version}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>Executor: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/executor/userName}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>JobID:</b> xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}
    </p>
    <p>
      <b>StartTime: </b>xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}
    </p></body><html>true</html></email></inputs>

<inputs><interactionUsers class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.UserEntity"><userName>Admin</userName><userId>1</userId></interactionUsers><actions><name>ContinueWorkflow</name><validateForm>true</validateForm></actions><inputs /><subject>xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_4/pb_CurrentState} Please provide appropriate action.</subject><sendEmail>true</sendEmail><approvalEnabled>false</approvalEnabled><email><from /><to /><cc /><bcc /><subject>Workflow waiting on Approval: xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} : xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</subject><attachments /><repeatInterval /><body><p>
      Please take appropriate action to continue the Workflow.
    </p></body><html>true</html></email><formProperties /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock
